full_summary:
### Learning Services SA Procurement Announcement

#### Invitation to Tender

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) invites interested contractors to submit their proposals for the provision of learning services in support of the Canadian Foreign Service Institute (CFSI) initiative. The Centre for Learning Services (CFSE) requires the services of a qualified contractor to provide a range of activities, including learning program coordination, facilitation, project management, e-Learning design and development, technical writing, and other support services.

#### Contract Duration

The initial contract period is 1 year, with four 1-year option periods.

#### Scope of Work

The successful contractor will be responsible for providing the following services:

* Learning event delivery and facilitation
* Learning event design and development
* Learning product design and development
* Related services and resources

#### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation of proposals will be based on the following criteria:

* Technical capability
* Past experience and performance
* Price

#### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01005077
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: 23-219793
* **Publication Date**: August 23, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 9, 2022, at 14:00 hours
* **Contracting Entity Name**: Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (Department of)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 125 Sussex Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0G2, Canada
* **Contact Information**:
  * Kingsley Knight, Kingsley.Knight@international.gc.ca, (343) 203-8234

#### Attachments

The complete procurement package, including the tendering documents and the request for proposal, is available for download on the Canada Buying Service website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/23/03f8d85d93c758347fd98d21edfbf172/23-219793_-_npp_-_english_-_final.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/23/03f8d85d93c758347fd98d21edfbf172/23-219793_-_npp_-_english_-_final.pdf).

#### Important Dates and Reminders

* September 9, 2022, by 14:00 hours ET: Tender closing date
